text: They should be somewhere on the `Marketing > Files and Templates > Design Tools`, the exact place differs on each theme. If you share the link to your site, or the theme name I might be able to help.

We’re in the same situation. Some of our portal’s (already working and live) legacy CTAs just all broke…went to 404s. We had to quickly replace with regular ol’ button links. (no real fix from HS yet on that…)

We’re testing out converting over to using GA4 to track events and not have to deal with iframes, code bloat and ‘just keep checking them to make sure they work’ options.
I didn't think they could break with the sunset, would love to know what clarification you get from HS
